title: instance state polling finds compute instance not in DB

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~tr3buchet

comments.content: Oooh... nice bug.  I suggest that the best fix would be that the XenServer driver shouldn't return the host machine, rather than handling this in the polling layer.  I think that's what you're suggesting anyway!
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~justin-fathomdb
